# finishInApp

**Type Property**

An option to ask the person setting up the accessory to finish additional setup in the app after the accessory is authorized.

## Declaration

```swift
static var finishInApp: ASPickerDisplayItem.SetupOptions { get }
```

## Options

- **rename**: An option to ask the person using the app to rename the accessory.
- **confirmAuthorization**: An option to require the app to finish accessory authorization before showing the setup view.
